thread.title: Power Rangers Releases New Photo Of Rita Repulsa
thread.title_full: Power Rangers Releases New Photo Of Rita Repulsa

author: Matthew Mueller
title: Power Rangers Releases New Photo Of Rita Repulsa
text:
Power Rangers Releases New Photo Of Rita Repulsa Matthew Mueller Back to Article Image of 
Rita Repulsa isn't known for being one for sappiness, so it stands to reason she would have a natural aversion to Valentines Day. 
While she's not for candy hearts and cute teddy bears, she does love to promote herself. Her most recent gift to Power Rangers fans happened to be a new photo with the caption "It’s Valentine’s Day, love is in the air… try not to breathe. #RepulsaTakesOver." 
The new image is a full body shot of Rita, who many suspect to be the original Green Ranger. That would explain why her costume is so different from her original series counterpart, opting for bright green as opposed to her brown and tan getup she used to sport. Lending further evidence to that theory is a recent look at Goldar, which shows a cockpit of sorts that a Rita figure can fit in. 
You can view the new image in the gallery. 
Power Rangers is currently holding a 3.36 out of 5 on ComicBook.com's anticipation rankings. If you haven't weighed in yet make sure to cast your vote ! 
"Saban’s Power Rangers follows five ordinary high school kids who must become something extraordinary when they learn that their small town of Angel Grove – and the world – is on the verge of being obliterated by an alien threat. Chosen by destiny, our heroes quickly discover that they are the only ones who can save the planet. But to do so they will have to overcome their real-life issues and band together as the Power Rangers before it is too late." 
Power Rangers stars Bryan Cranston (Zordon), Elizabeth Banks (Rita Repulsa), Naomi Scott (Kimberly/Pink Ranger), David Denman (Sam Scott), Becky G. (Trini/Yellow Ranger), Sarah Grey (Amanda), RJ Cyler (Billy Cranston/Blue Ranger), Emily Maddison (Rebecca), Ludi Lin (Zack Taylor/Black Ranger), and Dacre Montgomery (Jason Lee Scott/Red Ranger). 
Power Rangers is set to land in theaters on March 24, 2017.
